text: ai eemaan laanevaalo! un logon kee tarah na ho jaana jinhonne inakaar kiya aur apane bhaeeyon ke vishay mein, jabaki ve safar mein gae hon ya yuddh mein ho (aur unakee vahaan mrtyu ho jae to) kahate hai, "yadi ve hamaare paas hote to na marate aur na qatl hote." (aisee baaten to isalie hotee hai) taaki allaah unako unake dilon mein ghar karanevaala pachhataava aur santaap bana de. allaah hee jeevan pradaan karane aur mrtyu denevaala hai. aur tum jo kuchh bhee kar rahe ho vah allaah kee spasht mein hai
